sourcesContent:
<form>
    <label for="city">Select State:</label>
    <select name="city" id="city" [(ngModel)]="selectedCity">
      <option value="">-- Select City --</option>
      <ng-container *ngIf="cities.length > 0; else noCities">
        <option *ngFor="let city of cities" [value]="city">{{ city }}</option>
      </ng-container>
      <ng-template #noCities>
        <option disabled selected>-- No cities available --</option>
      </ng-template>
    </select>
    <button type="button" (click)="onSubmit()">Submit</button>
  </form> 


  <!-- <form>

    <select name="city" id="city" [(ngModel)]="selectedCity">
      <option value="">-- Select City --</option>
      <option *ngFor="let city of cities" [value]="city">{{ city }}</option>
    </select>
    <button type="button" (click)="onSubmit()">Submit</button>
  </form> -->
